title: A Glass Darkly
description: Wonders beckon beyond the glass device of the devious Morton Winter! But with such wonders comes great peril, as children disappear. Nevertheless, the intrepid witch Ingamald and the twelveâ€”fingered girl Yda pass through to the other side, searching for the means to thaw their own frozen world, Hinterlnd.
author: Gail Sidonie Sobat
